content.body: Ehsan Azari: I recommend reading https://whatwg.org/faq#adding-new-features. I skimmed through those links but they didn't really make it clear. In any event, extending node types can be done, but there better be some kind of big payoff.
content.formatted_body: Ehsan Azari: I recommend reading https://whatwg.org/faq#adding-new-features. I skimmed through those links but they didn't really make it clear. In any event, extending node types can be done, but there better be some kind of big payoff.

content.body:
Thanks, I'll do
This is some thoughts
```html
<template attributes="import export has" import="..." export="..." elements="el1 el2 ..." has="functionality open-shadow" shadowroot="open" >...</template>

<button attributes="import export has" import="..." export="..." has="some-behavior" class="className"></button>
```
